name: @jsabol/old-project-example
description: [Authenticate to the Github Package Registry](https://help.github.com/en/github/managing-packages-with-github-packages/configuring-npm-for-use-with-github-packages#authenticating-to-github-packages), first by creating a personal access token, then by running

scripts.build: node-sass src/base.scss dist/base.css && cp src/index.html dist/index.html
